thread.section_title: Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful Hotel!!
thread.title_full: Beautiful Hotel!! - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shahid H
title: Beautiful Hotel!!
text: The hotel itself is beautiful, from the smell, to design and even the Japanese toilet. Definitely will stay again at this hotel, location is great-food, metro, etc. Big shout out to Yannick, who works through the night, best customer service and goes out his way to make things right (thanks for ordering the pizza).
